alert.note: Alert for Darlington (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 03 at 4:42PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Darlington County through 515 PM EDT... At 441 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Hartsville, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hartsville, Darlington, North Hartsville, Dovesville, Lydia, Darlington Raceway, Auburn, Swift Creek, Clyde, Oats, Floyd, Kellytown and Carolina Pines Regional Medical Center. This includes Interstate 20 between mile markers 126 and 130. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
